name: Neon Sins -NS#01- Last Light
description: NS#01: "The sun hasn't even set yet and the city is already lighting up. One thing that I look forward to everyday after finishing work is taking this elevator down back home. These sounds and sights never get old. Wish I could be in an eternal loop of this last light." |||---||| "Neon Sins is a window into the urban sprawling concrete jungle of the neo-future. Come on a journey and witness the city as it comes alive. A hard place for those trying to make an honest living but a haven for those who can't wait to paint the night with their neon sins." |||---||| The whole short can be viewed here: https://youtu.be/2gPfIVbfq2U |||---||| 1920x1080 MP4 AUDIO/VIDEO LOOP
